title: Tpg and Netflix
body: Is it me or every since Netflix came to Australia my internet speeds get extremely slow  (140-200 ping) after 7-8pm and  (30-50 ping) in the afternoon (3-6pm) .I have called up tpg and they have sent some technicians over to see what the problem was  and ending up saying that nothing seemed wrong. I am currently using the unlimited adsl2+ unlimited plan, the one with unlimited local calls.
